question: Who addressed 3rd Global Investors'India Forum in New Delhi?
explanation: Union Minister of State (Independent Charge) for Power and New & Renewable Energy, R. K. Singh addressed the 3rd Global Investors'India Forum in New Delhi. It was organized by Associated Chambers of Commerce and Industry of India (ASSOCHAM). Theme of this event was 'Ideate, Innovate, Implement and Invest in India'.
